<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Confirm Publish Modal">2565decf3b5a3210bc1ccdd643e45a26</macroponent><name>handleArticlePublish</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     //Save changes before publish
    api.emit("GFORM_SAVE_RELAY_195fd4970f0210107d20409dc4767e0a");
    api.data.publish_knowledge_article.refresh({
        "articleId":api.context.props.sysId,
        "articleTable":api.context.props.table
    });
    api.emit("GLIDE_FORM_1_RELOAD_RELAY_429f31fbdbebd01045cf5ce4dc96193d");
    helpers.modal.close();
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-12 07:56:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>a565decf3b5a3210bc1ccdd643e45a2d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handleArticlePublish</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BOT Application" source="x_1896436_bot_ap_0">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BOT Application">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a565decf3b5a3210bc1ccdd643e45a2d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-12 07:56:55</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
